benak.tomas.crimemonitor.client

Class CrimesListActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • benak.tomas.crimemonitor.client.CrimeActivityBase<CrimesList>
        • benak.tomas.crimemonitor.client.CrimesListActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CrimeDataLoadingListener<CrimesList>, KodUtvaruLoadingListener, OnCrimeSelectedListener, SelectCrimeDateIntervalDialogFragment.SelectCrimeDateIntervalDialogFragmentExceptionHandler, SelectCrimeDateIntervalDialogFragment.SelectCrimeDateIntervalDialogListener

    public class CrimesListActivity
extends CrimeActivityBase<CrimesList>
implements OnCrimeSelectedListener
    CrimesListActivity is the activity class to display the list of all crimes.

    The list is displayed for a given department and a crime data interval.

    The crime data type used to hold the information for the statistics is CrimesList.

    Author:
    Tom

      • onCrimeSelected

        public void onCrimeSelected(int tsk)
        Called when a crime item is selected in the crime list view.

        The TSK identifier and the crime name is retrieved from a selected item and the user is navigated to the crime detail activity for the selected crime.

        Specified by:
        onCrimeSelected in interface OnCrimeSelectedListener
        Parameters:
        tsk - the TSK identifier of the selected crime
        See Also:
        CrimeDetailActivity

      • onOptionsItemSelected

        public boolean onOptionsItemSelected(MenuItem item)
        Description copied from class: CrimeActivityBase
        Handles the options menu item selection.

        As a result, either the crime is refreshed, the crime data interval selection dialog is displayed or the used is navigated to a different activity to display an alternative crime statistics view.

        Overrides:
        onOptionsItemSelected in class CrimeActivityBase<CrimesList>
